$interpreted: Ru-yi: Oh, nooooo~~~Is Sophie's mom okay?
Hanbei: Minnie used to love to feign sickness. She was always saying how much her chest hurt, then she would hand Sophie over to Morgan to take care of.
Hutchinson: Even though that's true, she may really be sick. Let's see what the doctor has to say.
Doctor: Although her condition has stabilized for now, there's a high probablility that it will strike again. It's important that the patient's emotions remain balanced.
Doctor: Otherwise...
Sophie: Otherwise what?
Doctor: Otherwise you should plan for the worst...
Ru-yi: How can it be...Sophie hasn't seen her mother in such a long time...
Hutchinson: Thank you, Doctor. I'll see you out.
Minnie: I was too young when I married your father. I had no idea how hard running a circus would be.
Minnie: At the time, I was frail and sickly, so I decided to run away from Morgan and from my responsibilites as a mother.
Minnie: Forgive me, I didn't mean to abandon you...I've missed you so much, my little Soph...
Sophie: I...
Sophie: ...I've missed you too...after Dad passed away I always wished you were by my side...
Minnie: Little Soph, please forgive your mother...
Sophie: ......
Hanbei: Hmph, you've been gone for so long. Now you're asking for forgiveness?
Ru-yi: Hanbei, be quiet! The doctor said not to destabilize her emotions.
Hutchinson: However you want to put it, if Sophie and her mother can make peace with each other, that would really be great~
Minnie: Momma's got so much to talk with you about. Why don't you come live with me?
Sophie: If I come live with you, what are Ru-yi and them supposed to do? The circus still has to perform...
Hutchinson: Sophie, you don't need to worry about us. It's rare that you get to see your mother. You ought to go live with her for a while.
Ru-yi: Yeah, you don't have to worry about the circus, Sophie. We're here to take care of it.
Sophie: But...
Rune: I'm...not happy. Rune and Sophie...are together.
Hanbei: I also don't agree. Sometimes Sophie is too naive. Unless we go with her, I won't feel comfortable.
Minnie: Thank you for sticking by Sophie's side for all these years. Why don't all of you come live at my house? That way I can adaquately repay you.
Ru-yi: Really!?
Hutchinson: Hanbei, so is it decided?
Hanbei: Hmph, whatever.
Minnie: This is great Soph, Momma can finally get to spend some time with you.
Ru-yi: Okay, then~well let's get our bags all packed and ready to go.
Ru-yi: Wah~Is this a palace? I've never seen such a beautiful garden before.
Minnie: Little Soph~Do you like it?
Sophie: Uh-huh. Very beautiful.
Sophie: How are you feeling?
Minnie: As long as my Soph is by my side, I won't have any issues.
Guard Dog: Woof! Woof!! Woof!!!
Minnie: A dog!? I hate dogs!!
Sophie: Ahhhh!!!
Rune: You...bit Sophie. Bad dog!!
Guard Dog: *sob* *sob*
Rune: Sophie, are you okay?
Minnie: Little Soph!
Minnie: Does it hurt? It's that stupid dog's fault. If you're hurt, I'll...
Sophie: It's okay. I'm fine.
Minnie: As long as you're okay. After such a long journey, you must be tired. Let's go to the room so you can rest.

Model.Text: Oh, nooooo~~~Is Sophie's mom okay?
Minnie used to love to feign sickness. She was always saying how much her chest hurt, then she would hand Sophie over to Morgan to take care of.
Even though that's true, she may really be sick. Let's see what the doctor has to say.
Although her condition has stabilized for now, there's a high probablility that it will strike again. It's important that the patient's emotions remain balanced.
Otherwise...
Otherwise what?
Otherwise you should plan for the worst...
How can it be...Sophie hasn't seen her mother in such a long time...
Thank you, Doctor. I'll see you out.
I was too young when I married your father. I had no idea how hard running a circus would be.
At the time, I was frail and sickly, so I decided to run away from Morgan and from my responsibilites as a mother.
Forgive me, I didn't mean to abandon you...I've missed you so much, my little Soph...
...I've missed you too...after Dad passed away I always wished you were by my side...
Little Soph, please forgive your mother...
Hmph, you've been gone for so long. Now you're asking for forgiveness?
Hanbei, be quiet! The doctor said not to destabilize her emotions.
However you want to put it, if Sophie and her mother can make peace with each other, that would really be great~
Momma's got so much to talk with you about. Why don't you come live with me?
If I come live with you, what are Ru-yi and them supposed to do? The circus still has to perform...
Sophie, you don't need to worry about us. It's rare that you get to see your mother. You ought to go live with her for a while.
Yeah, you don't have to worry about the circus, Sophie. We're here to take care of it.
But...
I'm...not happy. Rune and Sophie...are together.
I also don't agree. Sometimes Sophie is too naive. Unless we go with her, I won't feel comfortable.
Thank you for sticking by Sophie's side for all these years. Why don't all of you come live at my house? That way I can adaquately repay you.
Really!?
Hanbei, so is it decided?
Hmph, whatever.
This is great Soph, Momma can finally get to spend some time with you.
Okay, then~well let's get our bags all packed and ready to go.
Wah~Is this a palace? I've never seen such a beautiful garden before.
Little Soph~Do you like it?
Uh-huh. Very beautiful.
How are you feeling?
As long as my Soph is by my side, I won't have any issues.
Woof! Woof!! Woof!!!
A dog!? I hate dogs!!
Ahhhh!!!
You...bit Sophie. Bad dog!!
*sob* *sob*
Sophie, are you okay?
Little Soph!
Does it hurt? It's that stupid dog's fault. If you're hurt, I'll...
It's okay. I'm fine.
As long as you're okay. After such a long journey, you must be tired. Let's go to the room so you can rest.
